com.hazelcast.cache.impl.record

Class CacheDataRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.record.AbstractCacheRecord<Data,Data>
      • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.record.CacheDataRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheRecord<Data,Data>, Evictable<Data>, Expirable, DataSerializable, IdentifiedDataSerializable, Versioned

    public class CacheDataRecord
extends AbstractCacheRecord<Data,Data>
    Implementation of CacheRecord where value has an internal serialized format.
